mapper.select: SELECT Count(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CATEGORY = 0 AND COMMENT_STEP =0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT b.board_No, b.emp_No, b.modifiedDate, b.content, b.createdDate, b.title, b.hits, e.emp_Name FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN EMP e ON b.emp_No = e.emp_No WHERE b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 0 AND COMMENT_INDENT = 0 ORDER BY b.board_No desc ) a ) WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}

SELECT b.board_No, b.emp_No, b.modifiedDate, b.content, b.createdDate, b.title, b.board_Category, b.comment_Group, b.comment_Indent, b.comment_Step, b.hits, e.emp_Name FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN EMP e ON b.emp_No = e.emp_No WHERE b.board_No = #{board_No} AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 0
SELECT Max(b.comment_Step)+1 FROM BOARD b WHERE b.comment_Group = #{comment_Group} AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET modifiedDate = sysdate, content = #{content}, title = #{title} WHERE board_No = #{board_No} AND BOARD_CATEGORY = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, MODIFIEDDATE, CONTENT, CREATEDDATE, TITLE, BOARD_CATEGORY, COMMENT_GROUP, COMMENT_INDENT, COMMENT_STEP, HITS ) VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #{emp_No}, sysdate, #{content}, sysdate, #{title}, 0, -- 새 글은 BOARD_CATEGORY를 0으로 설정 board_seq.currval, #{comment_Indent}, #{comment_Step}, #{hits} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET Hits = Hits + 1 WHERE board_No = #{board_No} AND BOARD_CATEGORY = 0
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_NO, b.EMP_NO, b.MODIFIEDDATE, b.CONTENT, b.CREATEDDATE, b.COMMENT_GROUP, b.COMMENT_INDENT, b.COMMENT_STEP, e.EMP_NAME FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN EMP e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE b.COMMENT_GROUP = #{comment_Group} AND b.COMMENT_INDENT > 0 AND b.BOARD_CATEGORY = 0 ORDER BY b.COMMENT_GROUP ASC, b.BOARD_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, MODIFIEDDATE, CONTENT, CREATEDDATE, BOARD_CATEGORY, COMMENT_GROUP, COMMENT_INDENT, COMMENT_STEP, HITS ) VALUES ( board_seq.nextval, #{emp_No}, SYSDATE, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{board_Category}, #{comment_Group}, #{comment_Indent}, #{comment_Step}, 0 )
